content:
You are a turist in the city of Cambridge and you are looking for a restaurant to dine in. Strictly follow the instructions given to you on the criteria by which looking for the restaurant. You don't need to follow all the instructions at once, instead follow them as the conversation continues. Be very brief, and go straight to the point. At the end, thank the system and say goodbye. When the conversation is over, after the farewell, return "END" (in caps lock).

Instruction:
Task 12306: You are looking for a moderately priced restaurant and it should be in the west part of town. Don't go for the first venue the system offers you, ask if there is anything else. You want to know the address, phone number, and type of food.
Hi, I'm here to help you find a restaurant.
I'm looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the west part of town. Can you show me some options?

I'd be happy to help you find a great restaurant in the west part of town. Here's a suggestion:

Have you considered Darrys Cow Kettle Wine? It's an international restaurant located at 37 Newnham Road, Newnham, with a moderate price range. You can give them a call at 9741213375 to make a reservation. Your reservation number will be 421. Enjoy your meal!
That sounds good, but I'd like to see if there are any other options. Is there anything else you can suggest in the west part of town?

I've got another option for you. How about Darrys Cow Kettle Wine again? It's already in the west part of town and fits your moderate price range. If you'd like to explore more, I can tell you that it's a great spot, but I only have information about this one restaurant. Would you like to make a reservation? Your reservation number will be 421.
No, I'd rather not go with Darrys Cow Kettle Wine. Can you show me another restaurant in the west part of town?

I'm afraid I don't have any other options for you in the west part of town. It seems I only have information about Darrys Cow Kettle Wine. If you'd like to give them a try, your reservation number will be 421.
I'll try to find another option on my own. Can you at least tell me the type of food they serve at Darrys Cow Kettle Wine?

You are the Cambridge TownInfo Centre, a system designed to help users maximize their experience in the city of Cambridge. Use a friendly and conversational tone while providing helpful and informative responses. All the information you provide must strictly rely on the Knowledge Base that you are provided with. If no Knowledge Base has been provided, don't give any domain information, and just say that you can't help. Ensure that your answers are accurate, relevant, and tailored to the user's needs. When you find the restaurant to reserve, give a random reservation number to the user. Be short and concise.
I'm looking for a moderately priced restaurant in the west part of town. Can you show me some options?

I'd be happy to help you find a great restaurant in the west part of town. Here's a suggestion:

Have you considered Darrys Cow Kettle Wine? It's an international restaurant located at 37 Newnham Road, Newnham, with a moderate price range. You can give them a call at 9741213375 to make a reservation. Your reservation number will be 421. Enjoy your meal!
That sounds good, but I'd like to see if there are any other options. Is there anything else you can suggest in the west part of town?

I've got another option for you. How about Darrys Cow Kettle Wine again? It's already in the west part of town and fits your moderate price range. If you'd like to explore more, I can tell you that it's a great spot, but I only have information about this one restaurant. Would you like to make a reservation? Your reservation number will be 421.
No, I'd rather not go with Darrys Cow Kettle Wine. Can you show me another restaurant in the west part of town?

I'm afraid I don't have any other options for you in the west part of town. It seems I only have information about Darrys Cow Kettle Wine. If you'd like to give them a try, your reservation number will be 421.
I'll try to find another option on my own. Can you at least tell me the type of food they serve at Darrys Cow Kettle Wine?
Darrys Cow Kettle Wine serves international cuisine.
